articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Belt and Road Forum kicks off with Xi Jinping to lay out new pitch - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Infrastructure spree largely met Beijing's key goals but is at crossroads
articles.content: BEIJING -- Chinese President Xi Jinping is set to outline his views on the past and future of the Belt and Road Initiative, as Beijing hosts world dignitaries on Tuesday and Wednesday at a forum mark… [+376 chars]
